note.title: Conjure Elemental
note.text:
The following creatures are valid targets for the spell Conjure Elemental:
5th-Level Slot: • Air Elemental • Azer • Dust Mephit • Earth Elemental • Fire Elemental • Fire Snake • Gargoyle • Ice Mephit • Magma Mephit • Magmin • Mud Mephit • Salamander • Smoke Mephit • Steam Mephit • Water Elemental • Water Weird • Xorn
6th-Level Slot: • Galeb Duhr • Invisible Stalker
7th-Level Slot: • Air Elemental Myrmidon (Princes of the Apocalypse) • Earth Elemental Myrmidon (Princes of the Apocalypse) • Fire Elemental Myrmidon (Princes of the Apocalypse) • Water Elemental Myrmidon (Princes of the Apocalypse)
